originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

originalTitle: Israeli army kills 2 Palestinians in strikes on Gaza during Ramadan
title: Israeli army kills 2 Palestinians in strikes on Gaza during Ramadan
content: Latest Israeli attacks bring total death toll in Gaza since October 'ceasefire' to 614.

originalTitle: Pakistan-New Zealand Super Eights opener abandoned at T20 World Cup
title: Pakistan-New Zealand Super Eights opener abandoned at T20 World Cup
content: Persistent rain in Colombo forces abandonment of Pakistan's game with New Zealand, which was to open Super Eights stage.

originalTitle: LIVE: Manchester City vs Newcastle United – Premier League
title: LIVE: Manchester City vs Newcastle United – Premier League
content: Follow the build-up, analysis and live text commentary of the game as City host Newcastle at the Etihad Stadium.

originalTitle: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
title: Trump lashes out at Supreme Court justices over tariffs ruling
content: The six justices who voted against the tariffs, dealing a major blow to his signature economic policy, should be "absolutely ashamed", Trump said.

originalTitle: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
title: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
content: Far-left militants are suspected of being behind Quentin Deranque's death and the party of Jean-Luc Mélenchon is being widely condemned.

originalTitle: Nasa astronauts' moon mission likely to be delayed due to rocket issue
title: Nasa astronauts' moon mission likely to be delayed due to rocket issue
content: The mission to the far side of the Moon and back will likely be postponed after problems with were spotted with its rocket, a Nasa official said.

originalTitle: 'Drive and hunger' take Milner to Premier League appearance record
title: 'Drive and hunger' take Milner to Premier League appearance record
content: Brighton's James Milner starts against Brentford to break the all-time Premier League appearance record in his 654th match.

originalTitle: 'Like a dream' - Abraham relishing Villa return
title: 'Like a dream' - Abraham relishing Villa return
content: Seven years since firing them into the Premier League, Tammy Abraham is back scoring goals at Aston Villa to keep their fans and players dreaming of glory.

originalTitle: From £70 a week to Premier League record 24 years later
title: From £70 a week to Premier League record 24 years later
content: James Milner has broken the Premier League appearance record, 24 years after making his debut as a 16-year-old.
